LanguageData.WNA_Ritespot.label: ritespot
LanguageData.WNA_Ritespot.description: some mysterious influence is accumulating. this place must be a perfect place for doing something, for example, applying some whelingnorther techniques. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_RiteSpot_Cutter.label: ritespot
LanguageData.WNA_RiteSpot_Cutter.description: there seems to be some mysterious ripples. this place should be a good place to make something split or break down. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
